Question: "Drug use was heavily implicated" in this person's death, writes Guralnick.
Hints: As an only child, this person became close to both parents and formed an unusually tight bond with his mother.
In September 1941, this person entered first grade at East Tupelo Consolidated, where his instructors regarded him as "average".
Parker finally brought this person to national television, booking him on CBS's Stage Show for six appearances over two months.
